spec_data.Name: avahi-glib-devel
spec_data.Description:
The avahi-devel package contains the header files and libraries
necessary for developing programs using avahi with glib.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 12:19:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Libraries and header files for avahi glib development
